attributes.action: allow the use of portable music devices in GCSE Art Examinations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a GCSE Art student, I find using my 'Ipod' has positive effects on my art-work. Music motivates me to create inspirational art-work. Without the use of music, I feel I lack motivation to create inspirational art-work. I believe that others feel the same way.
As the art exam is next week, I hope my concern has been at least considered. Thank-you.
